dmca.title: Owner of Modeling Poodle Claims Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
A Classy Canine Pet Bowtique 	[Private] Dallas, Ga 30132


March 6, 2003

Google, Inc.
Attn: User Support, DMCA complaints
[Private]
Mountain View, CA 94043

Dear Sir or Madam:

Per your instructions regarding copyright infringement, I am providing the following information. On Saturday March 1, 2003, I typed in a search on http://www.google.com for "dog bows". Via that search, I decided to click on the word "images" on the resulting page where I was directed to http://images.google.com/images?hl=en&lr=&ie=UTF8&oe=UTF8&q=dog+bows&sa=N&tab=wi thereby I came upon a shock to see a competitor selling MY dog bows and using a photo of MY dog to sell the items. As per your request, the offending website's URL located in green lettering is "ziggysboutique.homestead.com/xmas.html"

She has stolen the photos from my website which very clearly states the items are all copyright (sic) by me and my company.

Let it be known that I can also access this webpage by a search from http://www.google.com by inputting "Ziggy's Boutique Xmas".

I have attached photos of the infringing items as shown direct from my website. I did infact (sic) take the photos myself with my digital camera. I do still own the dog that is shown and do have proof of this via AKC paperwork and an implanted microchip. I also have proof on my computer photo program of the exact date these photos were taken.

By doing a search on this website the contact information for the owner, and the person infringing upon my work is:

[Private] 
[Private]
CODY, WY 82414 
[Private]

"I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law." 

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed."

Sincerely,

[Private]
[Private]
[Private]-phone
[Private]-fax


These are perfect for dog groomers or pet owners that like to change the bows everyday.

These are Christmas show bows and can be ordered on the show bows page.

These	shown slightly larger than reality and are perfect for Maltese

Here is a picture of my "Poo" styling her red velvet jingle bell bows!

These are perfect for Yorkie/Shih Tzu/Poodles etc


10 bows $7.00
20 bows $12.00
40 bows $21.00
80 bows $40.00

CLICKHERE TO ORDER

GO BACK	GO TO NEXT SET OF BOWS

View Cart

					HOME PAGE

On large concrete items, we will double check the shipping cost for you and in some cases shipping will be less than quoted, especially if you live closer to us. We can be contacted for any questions at [private] or click the email bone above.

Greg's Garden Art & Becky & Ed's Dog breed collectibles
[Private]
Hiram Ga 30141
